messages.content:
Category: positivity
Text: the weather is good tonight, but im too tired.

Category: negativity
Text: I failed the exam and feel terrible.

Category: excitement
Text: I can't wait for the concert! It's going to be amazing!

Category: sadness
Text: My dog passed away, and I feel so empty.

Category: anger
Text: This service is awful! I've been waiting for hours!

Category: fear
Text: I heard a strange noise in the dark, and now I'm scared.

Category: surprise
Text: Wow! I didn't expect such a beautiful gift!

Category: love
Text: I adore spending time with you; you make me happy.

Category: disgust
Text: The smell from the garbage is absolutely revolting.

Category: gratitude
Text: Thank you so much for your help; I really appreciate it.

Category: confusion
Text: I don't understand this math problem at all.

Category: boredom
Text: This lecture is so dull; I can barely stay awake.

Category: hope
Text: Maybe things will get better soon.

Category: jealousy
Text: I can't stand seeing her with him; it makes me furious.

Category: pride
Text: I aced the test and feel so accomplished!

Category: loneliness
Text: Nobody called me on my birthday; I feel so alone.

Category: relief
Text: Finally, the pain is gone, and I can relax.

Category: curiosity
Text: How does this machine work? I want to learn more.

Category: happiness
Text: I just got promoted at work! This is the best day ever!

Category: frustration
Text: The app keeps crashing, and I can't get anything done!

Category: nostalgia
Text: Remembering childhood summers at grandma's house brings me joy.

Category: anxiety
Text: I have a presentation tomorrow, and I'm really nervous.

Category: disappointment
Text: I trained so hard, but still lost the match.

Category: admiration
Text: She handled the situation with such grace and intelligence.

Category: guilt
Text: I shouldn't have yelled at him; now I regret it.

Category: optimism
Text: Even if it's hard now, I believe things will improve.

Category: embarrassment
Text: I tripped in front of everyone and wanted to disappear.

Category: satisfaction
Text: The project turned out even better than I expected.

Category: despair
Text: Nothing I do seems to work; I feel completely hopeless.

Category: determination
Text: No matter how many times I fail, I'll keep trying.

Category: shock
Text: I can't believe they actually broke up after 10 years!

Category: amusement
Text: That joke was so silly, I couldn't stop laughing.

Category: impatience
Text: Why is this line moving so slowly? I've been waiting forever!

Category: serenity
Text: Sitting by the lake at sunset, I feel completely at peace.

Category: regret
Text: If only I had studied more, I wouldn't have failed.

Category: enthusiasm
Text: This new game is absolutely incredible! I love it!

Category: pity
Text: Seeing him struggle like that breaks my heart.

Category: indifference
Text: I don't really care what we eat for dinner.

Category: economics
Text: ЦБ РФ повысил ключевую ставку на 1% для борьбы с инфляцией.

Category: politics
Text: Путин подписал указ о новых мерах поддержки бизнеса.

Category: technology
Text: Роскосмос анонсировал запуск новой ракеты в 2024 году.

Category: sports
Text: Российские фигуристы завоевали золото на чемпионате мира.

Category: health
Text: Минздрав сообщил о снижении заболеваемости COVID-19.

Category: finance
Text: Рубль укрепился к доллару на фоне роста цен на нефть.

Category: international
Text: США ввели новые санкции против российских компаний.

Category: society
Text: В Москве открылся новый культурный центр с бесплатными мероприятиями.

Category: accidents
Text: В Подмосковье произошло ДТП с участием автобуса, есть пострадавшие.

Category: culture
Text: В Эрмитаже открылась выставка современных художников.

Category: education
Text: В России утвердили новые стандарты школьного образования.

Category: real estate
Text: Цены на жилье в Москве продолжили рост в начале года.

Category: transport
Text: В метро Москвы запустили новые поезда с улучшенным дизайном.

Category: ecology
Text: В России приняли новый закон о сокращении выбросов CO2.

Category: science
Text: Российские ученые разработали новый метод лечения рака.

Category: business
Text: Сбербанк объявил о снижении ставок по ипотеке.

Category: tourism
Text: Турпоток в Крым вырос на 20% за последний год.

Category: agriculture
Text: Урожай пшеницы в этом году превысил прошлогодние показатели.

Category: energy
Text: Россия увеличила экспорт газа в Европу на 15%.

Category: media
Text: Первый канал запустил новое ток-шоу о здоровом образе жизни.

Category: law
Text: Госдума приняла закон об ужесточении наказания за мошенничество.

Category: weather
Text: В центральной России ожидаются сильные снегопады на выходных.
